name: Calix, Inc.
description: Calix, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud and software platforms, systems, and services that enable service providers to deliver premium broadband services. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Petaluma, California, Calix empowers communication service providers (CSPs) to transform their networks and create exceptional customer experiences through innovative technologies. The company's product portfolio includes access systems, cloud services, and software solutions that facilitate the deployment of high-speed broadband and enhance operational efficiency. Calix's platforms are designed to help service providers manage their networks more effectively, improve service quality, and create new revenue streams. With a strong focus on the evolving needs of the market, Calix is committed to helping its customers leverage the power of data and analytics to optimize their operations and drive growth. The company's mission is to simplify the complexity of broadband delivery and provide the tools that service providers need to succeed in a competitive landscape.
